subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya turned a lap at 132.337 miles per hour and won the pole at the New Hampshire Motor Speedway for Sunday’s Nascar race.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya turned a lap at 132.337 miles per hour and won the pole at the New Hampshire Motor Speedway for Sunday’s Nascar race.
